title: Mibo Fresh Food Recalls Turkey Salad Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, April 8, 2017 Mibo Fresh Food, a Fort Worth, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 3,434 pounds of ready-to-eat salad products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains pieces of...
impacted_products: 2 7.2-oz. tray packages containing “Mibo Fresh Baby Greens with Turkey and Mango Salad with Sweet Onion Dijon Dressing.”
